long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remember life’s fun moments, through those old photos you never look at

So every time you open a new tab, for that second it takes you to type in the URL, we will make you smile and remember a nice moment. Enjoy that photo you took a year ago or more, and if it’s not a nice one, just type faster :D

★WHY★
We are Shachaf, Johnny and Ido
We take lots of photos... lots of photos
We never look at those photos, never (maybe Johnny does because he tidies his photos every few months but he’s a freak)
We thought it would be fun to see the photos in the context of one year ago, two years ago, three years ago… you get the idea


This is self-funded and a side project to keep us stimulated. We aren’t part of an evil corporation that is trying to spy on you, so please let us know if you like it or what we can do better. And if you want to buy us a coffee, we will take it :)
